description:
Thinking Skills is a critical element in developing students' independence.

In this course you will learn six thinking skills to unlock your students' creativity and problem-solving skills to make them successful, independent learners.

The course includes video materials and downloadable Word documents for your use.

The course is structured into three sessions: 1. an introduction   2. a tutorial on the six thinking skills   3. a conclusion/plenary for you to reflect on your learning.

Why is this course for you? If you are a teacher who wants to unlock your students' learning potential, or a student who wants to use your brain in a much more powerful way - then this course is for you!
title: Thinking Skills for Students
